definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: A-ming and sweet elder sister in order to free XiaoMin, find, south to help.
sentences.chinese: 阿明和甜姐爲了救出小敏，找到敦南幫助。

sentences.english: What if he turns out to be another Idi Amin?
sentences.chinese: 那時發現他是伊迪阿明第二怎麼辦？

sentences.english: Amin is the mobile phone, SMS is just the tone.
sentences.chinese: 手機是阿明的，剛纔那是短信提示音。

sentences.english: I want to bring in Shahira Amin. She's a former correspondent with Nile TV.
sentences.chinese: 我們接下來要前尼羅河電視臺記者阿明談談。

sentences.english: Ming who is my good friend teached me how to see the map and how to choice the way .
sentences.chinese: 我的好朋友阿明教我如何看地圖，如何選擇路線。

sentences.english: A-ming drunk, came to sweet elder sister home, finally found out I love.
sentences.chinese: 阿明喝醉酒來到甜姐家中，終於找到了本人的愛情。

definition: Alian District, a rural district in Kaohsiung, Taiwan
Bashir (name)/Omar Hassan Ahmad al-Bashir (1944-), Sudanese military man and politician, president of Sudan from 1993
Anwar (name)/Anwar bin Ibrahim (1947-), Malaysian politician, deputy prime minister 1993-1998, imprisoned 1999-2004 on charges including alleged homosexual acts, subsequently overturned
